forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 0C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 32F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
